item.title: Implement scripts running in Alfred Workflows with deanishe/awgo
item.description: deanishe/awgo is a library to implement scripts running in Alfred Workflows. It enables to pass values to the next object with NewItem(), access keychain, and check logs with MagicAction by calling wf.Args() and passing workflow:log as arguments. The code is executed every time a character is typed by default, so it would be better to cache results of API calls, etc. as follows. There are full codes in GitHub. package
